ygData.messageBody:
J Zenno wrote:

> In the book On Languages it states on the first page that in the
> ancient times there was a split and a war between magic users, what
> was to become the erudites with their wizardry and what was to become
> the Dark Elves with there Necromancy. It is said that to read the
> text of these ancient spell casters you must learn Old Erudian for the
> forefathers of Erudians and Elder Tier Dal for the forefathers of
> todays Dark Elves. I know that Tier Dal shows up as Dark Elvish when
> changing languages, I also learned in my travels that Elder Tier Dal
> shows up a Lizardman. Using my higher inteligence I have concluded
> that Necromancers would probably find it very usefull to learn Elder
> Tier Dal as I would find it usefull to learn Old Erudian. Now if
> anyone knows how I can learn Elder Dragon, the harsh complex language
> of magic itself please let me know. I would very interested in
> learning that language or Combine for that matter.
>
> May our paths cross
>
> Zakrul The Traveler
> Companion
> Wizard
> Britstlebane Server

It seems to me as I have met new races new languages appear ... perhaps
ye need meet a dragon to trigger the languae skill.. I have hear that
you need be higher skill than the one you teach to raise skill levels in
language and it seems to at least improve the speed of learning the
higher skill the teacher has. My Elder Erudian is now average ... so far
none I have met are higher and all are poor at the old dark elf and
lizardman ..

Xzar of Xegony
